Blaze the dragon was a peculiar creature, with scales that shimmered like diamonds and eyes that glowed like embers. He was different from the other dragons, who were all afraid of water. Blaze, however, was afraid of fire. He had seen the devastation it caused and the pain it inflicted on others. Despite his fear, he knew he had to find a way to overcome it. One day, he stumbled upon a group of humans who were in the midst of a fire, trying to put out a wildfire. Blaze knew he had to act, so he used his unique abilities to create a massive wave of water to douse the flames. The humans were amazed and grateful, and Blaze became a hero in their eyes.
